transcript:
Customer: Radha rani hume bhi bata de zara radha rani hume bhi
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir good evening free hue aap.
Customer: Haan free to nahi hua bas haan baat kar lete hain abhi.
Executive: Sir aap bataiye kya issue aa raha tha service se related.
Kyuki ticket raise hua hai aapka.
Customer: Madam ji na India mart pe ek mahine se na koi buylead dhang ki aa rahi na koi lead ho rahi mere
Executive: Ji haan.
Executive: Theek hai aap se main do teen cheeze puchungi sir ek baar aap mujhe bata dijiye theek hai aap pehle mujhe ye bataiye sir product kaun sa hai jisme deal karte hain.
Customer: Glass bottle ek minute ek minute.
Executive: Glass glass.
Executive: Glass bottle mein deal karte hain sir minimum order quantity lagbhag.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir main puch rahi thi minimum order quantity lagbhag.
Customer: 1000 pieces.
Executive: 1000 pieces okay and order value.
Customer: Order value.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Jaise haan bataiye jaisa uske according hota hai ye to jaisa maal hoga uske according.
Executive: Okay okay matlab as per the requirement right.
Customer: Haan haan haan theek hai theek hai and sir ye bataiye location ka to koi problem nahi hai pan india.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Pan india hi karte ho na.
Customer: All india yes.
Executive: Pan india na okay.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur ye bataiyega sir abhi tak jo bhi buyer se connect hue ho aap to matlab kya experience raha hai kahan problem aa rahi thi.
Customer: Buyer jyada to do achi khasi sahi hoti hai 1000 pieces ki 500 pieces ki baat karti hai sab kuch karti hai lekin wo maal nahi leti hain.
Executive: Sir aap ek baar isme karte ho deal aap mujhe batao glass jar mein.
Customer: Karte hain madam.
Executive: Sir ek baar aap ek baar buylead check karoge kyuki bilkul abhi abhi aayi hai.
Bilkul abhi abhi aayi hai sir aur hazar pieces ki hai aur order value bhi jyada hai.
Customer: Ek minute main check karta hu.
Executive: Haan aap open kar lo.
Customer: Buylead aayi hai.
Customer: Abhi isme to show nahi kar raha.
Executive: Kyu nahi show kar raha buylead mein jao aap buylead mein aapka relevant mein hi show kar raha hai starting mein gudgaon ka hai buylead abhi abhi aaya hai refresh karke dekho.
Customer: Madam abhi to mere paas phone hai main abhi office mein nahi hu.
Executive: Haan phone mein hi open karo sir main nahi keh rahi dekho 300 pieces ki aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sorry sir.
Customer: 300 pieces ki aa rahi hai 7000 ki.
Executive: Na na na sir abhi aayi hai dekho zero second pehle ki aayi thi hai main to proper dekh rahi hu aapka hi buylead open kiya hua hai aur kisi ka to kar bhi nahi rakha hai.
Customer: Show kar raha hai.
Customer: Hamare mein show hi nahi kar raha ye.
Executive: Sir gurgaon mein deal karte ho.
Customer: Main bola all india pan india pura chala gaya.
Executive: Minimum quantity aapne 1000 boli hai na right sir.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir abhi system mein open kar sakte ho kyuki kabhi kabhi jo new buylead aati hai wo show nahi kar sakte abhi time hold karna theek hai.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir haan ji.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Dusra call tha ek dusre phone pe.
Executive: Koi nahi kar lo aap.
Customer: Madam main ghar ja ke baat karu to sham ko.
Executive: Sir sham ko to nahi possible hoga aap kal kar lena fir.
Executive: Abhi main bas aapko sir do cheeze bata deti hu aap do cheezon ka dhyan rakh lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir dekho jo main abhi aapko buylead bata
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Party ka call aa raha hai dusre phone pe.
Executive: Sir do hi minute lagte hain bas.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Uh uska to bottle 400 500 ml ki aur 1000 ml ki hai.
Customer: Sir ek baar meri baat suniye aap jaise pehli baar final hoga na to iski image banegi pehle samajh rahe ho to jo final rahega fir aage change nahi hoga.
Customer: To sir fir to main abhi main office pe nahi hu.
Customer: Chalo main karta hu theek hai karwata hu.
Customer: Chalo main scale se map karke aapko whatsapp photo deta hu theek hai.
Customer: Baat sun rahe ho.
Customer: Sir.
Customer: Are nahi.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir fir main aapko kal hi call karu aaram se.
Customer: Haan madam kal kar lena aap theek hai.
Executive: Kal kisi bhi time kar lo sir.
Customer: Haan kal kar lo kal karna 12 baje ke baad.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good buyleads.

- Buyleads are not converting into sales.



Resolution:

- Executive checked for new buyleads.

- Executive asked about product details and location.

- Executive offered to call back the next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product details, follow up
